title: How to Beat the Dark Gaia Phoenix in Sonic Unleashed

steps.headline: Fly to Chun-nan on the World Map.
Then, you will face the Dark Gaia Phoenix.
steps.description: Follow these next steps to beat it:

steps.headline: Run around and dodge all of it's attacks.
After some attacks, it will fly and float next to one of the pillars.
Run to the pillar, grab the edge, and hoist yourself up.
There will be a water barrel there.
steps.description: Pick it up and throw it at the Dark Gaia Phoenix.

steps.headline: It's flames will go out and it will fly to the central platform.
Go to the central platform and beat the daylights out of it!
After you land some hits, it will start a sequence in which you must shake the Wii Remote and Nunchuk in order to inflict more damage.

text: Fly to Chun-nan on the World Map.  Complete the Night Acts.  Then, you will face the Dark Gaia Phoenix. Follow these next steps to beat it: Run around and dodge all of it's attacks.  After some attacks, it will fly and float next to one of the pillars.  Run to the pillar, grab the edge, and hoist yourself up.  There will be a water barrel there. Pick it up and throw it at the Dark Gaia Phoenix. It's flames will go out and it will fly to the central platform.  Go to the central platform and beat the daylights out of it!  After you land some hits, it will start a sequence in which you must shake the Wii Remote and Nunchuk in order to inflict more damage.  Repeat this two more times.
